reviewerName: Nathan M. Rose "Movie Guy from FlickDirect"
reviewText: If you are sick and tired of taking to long shipping items from your home office then this is the perfect item for you! For years I have been contemplating purchasing a dymo and always thought it was a waste of money. Boy could I have been any more wrong. This item is a lifesaver! It probably shaves 1 to 2 hours a day off my work. Thank you dymo for such a great product!
